name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
New York Times: China has set up "snail awards" in many places to humiliate cadres who lie flat and do nothing.
In recent years, as Xi Jinping has stepped up anti-corruption efforts, the country has cracked down on various fields such as the Internet, tutoring, and finance. It is now impossible to guess what will happen next. Some officials have no motivation for fear of anti-corruption purges, and even simply lie flat and do nothing.
But as the economy slows, Chinese leaders need to launch new projects to attract investors. Now may be the time when the Chinese government can least tolerate officials' slackness.
According to the People's Daily, at least three cities have begun to issue "snail awards". Punish and humiliate cadres who lie flat and do nothing. A video of an official TV program on Chinese social media showed several men in suits and expressionless faces receiving framed certificates.
A district in Guangdong Province said they had established a database to track those "officials who lie flat." Other places have also promoted their own...
fullContent:
纽约时报：中国多地设立“蜗牛奖”羞辱躺平和不作为的干部。
 近年来，由于习近平加大反腐力度，国家打击了互联网、家教、金融等各个领域。导致现在已经无法猜测接下来会发生什么，一些官员因害怕反腐清洗而没有动力，甚至干脆躺平不作为。
 但随着经济放缓，中国领导人需要推出新项目吸引投资者，现在或许是中国政府最不能容忍官员懈怠的时候。
 据《人民日报》报道，至少有三个城市开始颁发“蜗牛奖”。惩罚羞辱那些躺平不作为的干部。中国社交媒体上的一段官方电视节目视频显示，几名穿着西装、面无表情的男子接过装裱好的证书。
 广东省一个城区表示，他们建立了一个数据库，用来追踪那些““躺平”的官员。”还有的地方还宣传了自己对员工进行岗位调整或解雇的处理。

name: 李老师不是你老师

In order to win the lawsuit smoothly, they will refuse any form of donations. Although the heat is getting lower and lower, they will insist on speaking out to the end.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On February 20, a woman who claimed to be a Peking University graduate talked about why she didn't let her children watch "Nezha": There is a line in the movie "My fate is determined by me, not by God", but can we do that in real life? Not everyone is the protagonist in life.
After the video was released, the woman was cyberbullied. Netizens accused her of saying such words at the critical moment of Nezha's rush to the top of the list. Some netizens also said that they should "be true to herself" offline. Under pressure from public opinion, the woman deleted all the videos.

On February 20, a citizen reported that the Ruzhou Municipal Government published a list of one-time subsidies for farmers in Jiaocun Town in 2024 on its official website. In addition to the names of the villagers, the list also included private information such as ID numbers and mobile phone numbers.
The citizen wrote to the Ruzhou Municipal Government to report the incident, but as of now, this private information can still be viewed on the official website. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892874271942144000/pu/img/oq6vJWnMDzb3sNf-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the economy slows down, China's medical industry faces financial difficulties and a wave of bankruptcies.
On February 20, Maria Maternity Hospital in Chengdu, Sichuan, had problems such as delayed employee wages and inability to refund prepaid medical fees on time. The video shows that people who came to the hospital to refund their fees lined up in a long line.
Just half a month ago, Tangshan Nanhu Hospital, a tertiary hospital with an investment of nearly 2 billion yuan, was suddenly reported to have closed down, and hospitalized patients were notified to be discharged or transferred.
The New York Times reported that during the epidemic, the government's large-scale testing led to a surge in hospital expenses, and the collapse of the real estate market after the epidemic caused an economic downturn. People postponed the treatment of non-emergency diseases to save money; China's aging population has caused the growth rate of medical expenses to exceed the progress of medical insurance fund receipts. This has led to financial difficulties for public and private hospitals in various places.
The following is a list of public hospitals that will close and owe wages in 2024: (incomplete statistics):
Meizhou Jiaying College Medical College Affiliated Hospital:
October 23...
fullContent:
经济下行，中国医疗行业面临财务困境和破产潮。
 2月20日，四川成都玛丽亚妇产医院，出现拖欠员工工资，就医民众预付费无法按时退还等问题。视频显示，前来医院退费的人排起了长队。
 就在半个月前，投资近20亿的三甲医院唐山南湖医院突然被曝倒闭，住院患者被通知出院或转院。
 纽约时报报道称，疫情期间，政府大规模检测导致医院开支激增、疫情后房地产市场崩盘引发经济下滑，人们为省钱推迟了非紧急疾病的治疗；中国人口老龄化导致医疗费用增速超过了医保基金进款的进度。导致各地公私医院面临财务困难。
以下为 2024年倒闭和欠薪的公立医院名单：(不完全统计)：
 梅州市嘉应学院医学院附属医院：
 10 月 23 日起停诊，该医院始建于 2009 年，是梅州市市直公立综合性二级医院。2024 年 1 月起开始欠薪，100 多名合同人员将签署离职协议，同时半年内给付拖欠工资和赔偿金。（完整名单请见，图2、图3）

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 21 (Released) Liaoning. A farmer said that a farm in Anhui actually raised 600 cows, but the farm reported 6,000 cows and received 600,000 yuan in state subsidies; another farm did not even raise a single cow and received 6 million yuan in subsidies every year.
But we, the free-range farmers, have both site equipment and cows, but we don’t get a penny in subsidies. Previously, leaders also came to register the number of cows, but there was no follow-up. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892905857723355139/pu/img/ahdGo144T-pZGhVt.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The controversy over the Chinese government's plan to build a "super embassy" in London has attracted the attention of the United States. The U.S. House of Representatives' Select Committee on China said that the Chinese government's plan poses "major security risks" and is worried that the Chinese government will use this new giant embassy to interfere in British affairs, conduct surveillance activities, and pose risks to sensitive infrastructure such as London's financial services. The committee said that urgent action must be taken to resolve this issue. Some commentators believe that the fact that American lawmakers rarely speak out on British affairs shows the seriousness of the problem.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Associated Press: Disposable e-cigarettes made in China, such as Elf Bar, have infiltrated some American middle and high schools and become the first choice for students. These products are not approved by federal regulators, but enter the US market with the logos of batteries, mobile phones or other products and are illegally transported to New York.
New York State prosecutors have filed lawsuits against some of the largest e-cigarette distributors in the United States, demanding that these distributors pay hundreds of millions of dollars in compensation and permanently ban them from selling in New York State. The companies sued include several companies in New York, California, Florida and Illinois.

Blood immediately flowed all over the floor, and the man in yellow quickly left the mahjong parlor after the murder. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892948306155700224/pu/img/QsO80v50cAV1Eysm.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Macron conveys message to Trump: "You can't be weak in front of Putin"
French President Macron said in an online question-and-answer session held in the evening of February 20 local time that he will persuade US President Trump during his upcoming visit to the United States to let Trump understand that the strategic interests of the United States are consistent with those of European allies.
Macron also said that he plans to tell Trump: "I will tell him: You can't be weak in front of President Putin. This is not your style, it is not your nature, and it is not in your interest." "If you are weak in front of Putin, how can you remain credible in front of China?"

They must not bribe or corrupt officials. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GkUgFnvakAAsH2D.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 20, Dongguan, Guangdong. A man said, "The basic salary for working in Dongguan is 2,000 yuan." The average monthly salary is about 4,000-5,000 yuan. After deducting various expenses, you can save 1,000-3,000 yuan a month. After returning home to buy some things for your parents and children, there is almost nothing left. The poor don't want to have children. Everyone wants their sons to be successful and their daughters to be successful, which leads to an increasingly competitive society. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1892962383519494144/pu/img/1e_6nkoMLtY3F1Ai.jpg
